New Records: Seattle Mariners set a new MLB record with 113 hit-by-pitches for the season
Key Match Events: Leody Taveras hit a walk-off home run in the ninth inning
Victor Robles added insurance with a two-run single in the sixth inning
Josh Smith hit a three-run home run in the sixth inning
Post-Match Reflections: Dan Wilson emphasized the importance of resilience and being ready to play the next day
Cal Raleigh expressed the team's desire to go to Houston and beat the Astros
Others: The Mariners entered the game with a chance to make up ground in the AL Wild Card race as the Royals and Twins lost their respective games
